title: Retinal fundus imaging as biomarker for ADHD using machine learning for screening and visual attention stratification
details: H Choi, JS Hong, HG Kang, MH Park, S Ha, J Lee… - npj Digital Medicine, 2025
abstract: Attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD), characterized by diagnostic complexity and symptom heterogeneity, is a prevalent neurodevelopmental disorder. Here, we explored the machine learning (ML) analysis of retinal fundus photographs …
